headline: Top 5 Railroad Equipment & Railcar Leasing Stocks: Picks & Shovels of Logistics
summary: The railroad industry is a logistics artery, but the companies supplying the equipment that moves freight are where the real money gets made. Locomotives, railcars, tank cars, and digital rail systems are the picks and shovels of modern logistics. These companies capture recurring revenue from manufacturing, leasing, and maintenance contracts, benefiting from regulatory replacement cycles, ... Top 5 Railroad Equipment & Railcar Leasing Stocks: Picks & Shovels of Logistics
